article.title: Status and history for [yrk]
article.para: Article 15 should have two clauses, has only one.
Article 16 should have three clauses, has only two.
Article 27 should have two clauses, has only one.
Article 29 should have three clauses, has only two.

history.history-entry: stage 4: Unicode text contributed by Nicolas Stefanovitch.
stage 2: OHCHR identified as the source.
